overview:
Giuseppe Stuto is a marketing and business developer with Auctus Partners, primarily focusing on companies that have a strong web presence.

Giuseppe is currently finishing his B.S.B.A in Finance at the Boston University School of Management. In adjunct with his academics, Giuseppe has extensive financial related experience by having served at Gordon Brothers Group, an appraisals firm, as well as at Merrill Lynch in their investment management division. Giuseppe contributed to Merrill Lynch with day-to-day client portfolio management. He recently completed a role at Bank of America Merrill Lynch serving as a 2010 Summer Analyst in the Real Estate Banking Division. Following his summer analyst role, Giuseppe looked for an opportunity that would give him increased exposure to the markets and business in general. He joined OTR Global in the Fall of 2010 and aided the research and sales and trading team. Currently Giuseppe serves at SVG Capital aiding their private equity/venture capital fund of funds team.

After accumulating this experience in finance, business development, and private equity/venture capital, he joined forces with Sean Kumar to form Auctus Partners. Auctus Partners is a modern full service business development agency focusing our talents and expertise to help bring new and exciting ideas from the very early seed stage into a growth stage finished product. We primarily target young start-ups/college start-ups, but are open to all businesses seeking out our capabilities.

Within Auctus Partners, Giuseppe has been actively engaged in developing the MadPads business strategy and preparing for fundraising.
